import React, {useContext} from 'react' import { UserContext } from '../usercontext/usercontext' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const Edit = () => { const[users, setUsers]= useContext(UserContext); const {id}=useParams(); const user=users.filter((user)=>user.id===id); return (
ID Name Address Qualification Mobile No.
) } export default Edit
